snippet: Organizers of the annual tournament in Rapid City, S.D., are entertaining offers from other potential host sites because of racial tensions in Rapid City.
abstract: Lakota Nation Invitational basketball tournament may move from Rapid City, SD, after reports that Native American children were subjected to racial slurs at hockey game in city; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Organizers of the annual tournament in Rapid City, S.D., are entertaining offers from other potential host sites because of racial tensions in Rapid City.

headline.main: Racial Tensions May Prompt a Move of Lakota Nation Invitational Tournament
headline.print_headline: Basketball: Racial Tensions May Prompt a Move
